section_title: 21k06 - Sec 13(b)(8) may apply to a restaurant engaged in laundering.
text:
Prior to 5/1174, the
Sec 13(b)(8) exemption applied to any employee employed by an establishment
which is a hotel, motel, or restaurant including those engaged in laundering.
Employees of a restaurant engaged in laundering are subject to Sec 13(b)(8).
html: Prior to 5/1174, the Sec 13(b)(8) exemption applied to any employee employed by an establishment which is a hotel, motel, or restaurant including those engaged in laundering. Employees of a restaurant engaged in laundering are subject to Sec 13(b)(8).
